commit.message:
Commit for Asher Langton  <langton2@llnl.gov>

gcc/
	* decl.c (match_type_spec): Add a BYTE type as an extension.

testsuite/
	* gfortran.dg/byte_1.f90: New test.
	* gfortran.dg/byte_2.f90: New test.

From-SVN: r105823

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,7 @@
+2005-10-23  Asher Langton  <langton2@llnl.gov>
+
+	* decl.c (match_type_spec): Add a BYTE type as an extension.
+
 2005-10-23  Paul Thomas  <pault@gcc.gnu.org>
 
 	PR fortran/18022

@@ -1,17 +1,22 @@
+2005-10-23  Asher Langton  <langton2@llnl.gov>
+
+	* gfortran.dg/byte_1.f90: New test.
+	* gfortran.dg/byte_2.f90: New test.
+
 2005-10-23  David Edelsohn  <edelsohn@gnu.org>
 
 	* gcc.dg/attr-alias-3.c: XFAIL on AIX.
 
 2005-10-23  Paul Thomas  <pault@gcc.gnu.org>
 
 	PR fortran/18022
-	gfortran.dg/assign_func_dtcomp_1.f90: New test.
+	* gfortran.dg/assign_func_dtcomp_1.f90: New test.
 
 	PR fortran/24311
-	gfortran.dg/merge_char_const.f90: New test.
+	* gfortran.dg/merge_char_const.f90: New test.
 
 	PR fortran/24384
-	gfortran.dg/spread_scalar_source.f90: New test.
+	* gfortran.dg/spread_scalar_source.f90: New test.
 
 2005-10-22  Hans-Peter Nilsson  <hp@axis.com>

@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+! { dg-do compile }
+! { dg-options "-std=f95" }
+program testbyte
+  integer(1) :: ii = 7
+  call foo(ii)
+end program testbyte
+
+subroutine foo(ii)
+  integer(1) ii
+  byte b          ! { dg-error "BYTE type" }
+  b = ii
+  call bar(ii,b)
+end subroutine foo
+
+subroutine bar(ii,b)
+  integer (1) ii
+  byte b          ! { dg-error "BYTE type" }
+  if (b.ne.ii) then
+!     print *,"Failed"
+     call abort
+  end if
+end subroutine bar

@@ -0,0 +1,22 @@
+! { dg-do run }
+! { dg-options "-std=gnu" }
+program testbyte
+  integer(1) :: ii = 7
+  call foo(ii)
+end program testbyte
+
+subroutine foo(ii)
+  integer(1) ii
+  byte b
+  b = ii
+  call bar(ii,b)
+end subroutine foo
+
+subroutine bar(ii,b)
+  integer (1) ii
+  byte b
+  if (b.ne.ii) then
+!     print *,"Failed"
+     call abort
+  end if
+end subroutine bar
